description:
This course will show you how to cut down the learning curve quickly and get up to speed as a high paid tutor.

*** Now with Additional BONUS LECTURES - Tutor Tips, Insider information, and "Behind the Scenes" video footage to give you even more resources to make your tutoring business even more successful and profitable. Join now the hundreds who have already taken this course and made their tutoring a success.****

This course will teach you how to start a tutoring business and grow your business.

This course will enable you to become a self-employed private tutor making a good income. I will be sharing with you all the fine details of:

1. Why tutoring is an in demand field.

2. What you need to succeed.

3. How to promote your business successfully.

4. How to conduct and optimize your sessions.

5. Record keeping

6. How to maximize your scheduling, profitability and more.

I will be providing you with all of the forms and materials that I personally use in my full-time private tutoring business as well as sharing with you everything that I have learned in my many years as a successful full time private tutor.

* Note this course does not teach how to hire tutors to work for you or how to manage a team of tutors. It is designed to teach you how to be self-employed as a private tutor.
title: Start a Successful Tutoring Business as a High Paid Tutor
